column4: Attentional orienting and executive control are affected by different types of meditation practice
column12:
dandao meditation training typically prac-
tice using their minds to regulate their Qi. Qi is defined, in terms of the traditional Chinese qigong, as a person’s bioenerget-
ics. Regulating Qi involves voluntarily focusing attention on specific acupoints in the human body, and the procedures

involved in this practice are consistent with the definition of FA meditation proposed by Lutz et al. (2008).

involved in this practice are consistent with the definition of FA meditation proposed by Lutz et al. (2008).
